title: sponge服务端 怎么给op个下op
author: lsaoan
txt_content: sponge服务端 怎么给op个下op 萌新求助大佬解答

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
lp u ID permission set * true 
lp u ID permission unset * true

replies.author: alon74
replies.txt_content: 一楼的回答不对，官网强调了不能用这个指令，可能出问题。应该是/nucleus setupperms [USER|MOD|ADMIN] <权限组名>，站内其他帖子有讲怎么用
